name: saori-2-5-trump-agent
author: 0mka
description: AI-driven NPC agent using a VRM avatar that listens for chat messages and player enter/leave events, sends world state to an external endpoint, and renders speech bubble UI responses. Triggers configurable emotes (wave, think, cheer, explain) and rotates to look at targeted players.
